ygData.subject: Need +int stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a level 21 wizard who needs +int items. I have +2 rings and a BiM, but have not tried to get any other items or do any quests for I think I m too low a
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a level 21 wizard who needs +int items. I have +2 rings and a BiM, but
have not tried to get any other items or do any quests for I think I'm too
low a level. If someone could please tell me when I can get some +int items
and from where, or what quests I could do at my level I'd be greatful.
Thanks,
Lott.

P.S. I know about Cubert and the Stein of Mogok, but at the present time I'm
not able to do these since I'm an evil race on a PvP teams server.
